ACTOR1: ZANU-PF: Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front
NOTES: On Thursday in Chipinge Central, the 48 year old district chairperson, Perpetua Pedzisayi, was assaulted by youth militia and CIO agents, led by Charles Jambaya and Temba Manaiwa. The same gang assaulted a disabled teacher at a school in the area and broke his arm as well.

ACTOR1: ZANU-PF: Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front

NOTES: This week members of the Mugabe loyal, Johanne Marange Apostolic sect, have invaded one of Zimbabwe's biggest dairy farms in Chipinge, ordering the farmer to leave within 24 hours. CONSOLIDATED_NOTES: Johanne Marange Apostolic Sect Civilians (Zimbabwe) This week members of the Mugabe loyal, Johanne Marange Apostolic sect, have invaded one of Zimbabwe's biggest dairy farms in Chipinge, ordering the farmer to leave within 24 hours. NOTES: Botswana's striking government employees caused public disorder in the African country's second city Francistown on Tuesday as thousands of strikers barricaded roads with burning tires. According to local radio GABZ, the striking workers in the city took to the streets, barricading roads, burning tires and even throwing stones at passing cars. The police had to use tear gas to disperse the rioters, some workers have been arrested by the police.
CONSOLIDATED_NOTES: Rioters (Botswana) Police Forces of Botswana (2008-) Botswana's striking government employees caused public disorder in the African country's second city Francistown on Tuesday as thousands of strikers barricaded roads with burning tires. According to local radio GABZ, the striking workers in the city took to the streets, barricading roads, burning tires and even throwing stones at passing cars. The police had to use tear gas to disperse the rioters, some workers have been arrested by the police.  Xinhua
